ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 147
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Annoyed me to when I went back and read it.  I think I mis-phrased what I was trying to say.  Some people were being very generous in the prices they
ygData.messageBody:
>Interesting. I assume people who are not consumed with haggling down
>to the last cp, screwing you over, or obsessing over trade values are
>the stupid people? Ever thought that people may have been stupid
>because they liked you, were in a hurry, or much preferred the item
>you had to trade?

>No big deal, just the expression annoyed me.


Annoyed me to when I went back and read it. I think I mis-phrased what
I was trying to say. Some people were being very generous in the prices
they wanted for some items. You are most certainly right though, I was
out of line in my comments.

--

Hammeron
Monk of Quellious
Karana

--
Worlord
worlord@...
